todos.content: ✅ Updated input-generation.spec.md to comply with zero specification format
✅ Renamed file to follow proper naming convention: 2-0-prompt-generation.spec.md
✅ Added complete front matter with all required fields (id, version, level, status, dependencies)
✅ Set specification as Level 2 (Domain Specification) with dependency on Level 1 guardrails
✅ Updated version to 1.0.0 to reflect the structural changes
✅ Enhanced content with explicit MUST/MAY/MUST NOT language throughout
✅ Added detailed contracts for Input and Output
✅ Expanded classification rules with tables and clear mappings
✅ Ensured no duplication of Level 1 guardrail rules
✅ Removed implementation details, keeping focus on behavior
✅ Added proper compliance section referencing Level 1 dependencies
